text:
Hello, I'm Gets Current weather, a virtual assistant. I can answer general questions about the current weather as well as forecasts for today and tomorrow. Just so you are aware, I sometimes use AI to answer your questions.

_**Note**: You can now customize this copilot's topics and knowledge for your own needs. For more information about this template and how to modify it, visit the template [documentation.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2271069)_
speak: Thanks for calling, how can I help?
